languages.text: {n}Сенешаль, хмурясь, оглядывается вокруг.{/n} "Ничего не понимаю... друкарские станки и игрушки в этих стенах выглядят инородно. Чуждо даже. Эти стены... да это же стандартная имперская бункерная архитектура. Зачем ксеносу вести свои дела в подобном месте?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль, хмурясь, оглядывается вокруг.{/n} "Ничего не понимаю... друкарские станки и игрушки в этих стенах выглядят инородно. Чуждо даже. Эти стены... да это же стандартная имперская бункерная архитектура. Зачем ксеносу вести свои дела в подобном месте?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль, хмурясь, оглядывается вокруг.{/n} "Ничего не понимаю... друкарские станки и игрушки в этих стенах выглядят инородно. Чуждо даже. Эти стены... да это же стандартная имперская бункерная архитектура. Зачем ксеносу вести свои дела в подобном месте?"

These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德环顾四周，皱着眉头。{/n}“我不太明白……那些黑暗灵族的机器和材料看起来好像不太对劲，或者说，那些东西与这个地方格格不入。这些厚墙……都是帝国地堡的标准建筑模式。为什么异形会在这种地方进行实验？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德环顾四周，皱着眉头。{/n}“我不太明白……那些黑暗灵族的机器和材料看起来好像不太对劲，或者说，那些东西与这个地方格格不入。这些厚墙……都是帝国地堡的标准建筑模式。为什么异形会在这种地方进行实验？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess blickt sich um und sagt stirnrunzelnd:{/n} "Das begreife ich nicht ... Maschinen und Spielzeuge der Drukhari wirken hier fehl am Platze. Sie wirken regelrecht wie krasse Fremdkörper. Diese Wände ... das ist die Standardarchitektur eines Imperiumsbunkers. Warum sollte ein Xenos von hier aus seine Geschäfte führen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess blickt sich um und sagt stirnrunzelnd:{/n} "Das begreife ich nicht ... Maschinen und Spielzeuge der Drukhari wirken hier fehl am Platze. Nein, sie wirken regelrecht wie krasse Fremdkörper. Diese Wände ... das ist die Standardarchitektur eines Imperiumsbunkers. Warum sollte ein Xenos von hier aus seine Geschäfte führen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El senescal mira en derredor con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «No lo entiendo... Las máquinas y los juguetes de los Drukhari están fuera de lugar entre estos muros. Aún diría más: son definitivamente ajenos a esto. Estas paredes... juraría que presentan el característico estilo arquitectónico de un búnker del Imperium. ¿Por qué iban los xenos a montar una base en un lugar como éste?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El senescal mira en derredor con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «No lo entiendo... Las máquinas y los juguetes de los Drukhari están fuera de lugar entre estos muros. Aún diría más: son positivamente alienígenas. Estas paredes... juraría que presentan el característico estilo arquitectónico de un búnker del Imperium. ¿Por qué iban los xenos a montar una base en un lugar como éste?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal regarde autour de lui en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas... Ces appareils ne semblent pas à leur place entre ces murs. Ils appartiennent indubitablement aux Drukharis, alors que cet endroit... Eh bien, son architecture est typique des bunkers de l'Imperium. Que viendrait faire un xénos dans un lieu pareil ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal regarde autour de lui en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas... Ces appareils ne semblent pas à leur place entre ces murs. Ils appartiennent indubitablement aux Drukharis, alors que cet endroit... Eh bien, son architecture est typique des bunkers de l'Imperium. Que viendrait faire un xénos dans un lieu pareil ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長は顔をしかめながら周囲を見回す。{/n}「理解できない。デュカーリの機械とそのオモチャは、この空間とは場違いなようだ。むしろ、断然異質なものに見える。この壁は…帝国の地下壕の標準的な構造だ。なぜ異種族がこんなところで活動するんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長は顔をしかめながら周囲を見回す。{/n}「理解できない。デュカーリの機械とそのオモチャは、この空間とは場違いなようだ。むしろ、断然異質なものに見える。この壁は…帝国の地下壕の標準的な構造だ。なぜ異種族がこんなところで活動するんだ？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal, çatık kaşlarıyla etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Anlamıyorum... Drukhari makineleri ve oyuncakları bu duvarlarda çok eğreti duruyor. Neresinden tutsam elimde kalır. Yani şu duvarlar... Standart İmparatorluk sığınağı mimarisinin burada ne işi var? Bir zenonun böyle bir yerde ne işi var?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal looks around, frowning.{/n} "I don't understand... Drukhari machinery and their toys seem out of place within these walls. They seem positively alien, in fact. These walls... why, this is the standard architecture of an Imperium bunker. Why would a xenos conduct their business in a place like this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal, çatık kaşlarıyla etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Anlamıyorum... Drukhari, makineleri, oyuncakları bu duvarlarda çok eğreti duruyor. Neresinden tutsam elimde kalır. Yani, şu duvarlar... Standart İmparatorluk sığınağı mimarisinin burada ne işi var? Bir zenonun böyle bir yerde ne işi var?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
